transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Helm of the Light Avenger

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 820,052 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 306,555.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shoulderguards of the Light Avenger

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 820,052 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 306,555.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cinch of the Light Avenger

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 820,052 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 306,555.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 820,052 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 306,555.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Feed the Coagulum, redirecting 20% of all healing done until 1.4 million healing has been consumed. Once sated, the Coagulum bursts to heal 5 allies for 1 million.

Lingering effluvia causes affected allies' next attacks to deal an additional 25,524 Shadow damage, increased based on overhealing done by the Coagulum. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 30 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
